name: Miguel
description: I am an honest and caring person and I hope you would be too. I believe honesty is the best policy. I like to experience new things. I am willing to try anything once.I am here because I am ready to find true love. I am well educated, well traveled, and financially secure; however, I feel like something is missing, and that something is having a relationship with a great man with whom I can love and be loved….unconditionally, romantically, intimately.I believe in the old golden rule ..
